message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a great deal and I think you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're looking for a good deal. While $12000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $13500 to make this work. This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13500, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?
